p: Overall, the EOs of the wild hemps and registered cultivars in this study were similar to those reported previously: 0.23 to 0.31% in fresh inflorescences [ 14], 0.29 to 0.19% depending on the collection time with higher EO yield from plants sampled earlier (in September than in October) [ 13], and 0.1% in stems and 0.15% in the leaves of wild hemp from Austria [ 15], respectively. However, the EO content of the USA hemp strain, utilized for CBD production in the USA and grown near the field trials was 1.15 to 1.2%.
